sections.heading: Action
sections.text:
in name of State against public officer, association or usurper of public

office or franchise.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: in name of State against corporation.

sections.heading: Attorney
sections.text: General to begin action.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: brought on relation of another; security for costs.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: for usurpation by claimant in name of State; bond.

sections.heading: Name
sections.text:
of person entitled to office set forth in complaint; judgment may determine

rights of both incumbent and claimant.

sections.heading: All
sections.text: claimants to same office made defendants.

sections.heading: Jurisdiction
sections.text: in appellate or district court.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text: to file complaint; notice to defendant; hearing.

sections.heading: Issuance
sections.text: of summons; when unnecessary.

sections.heading: Pleadings.
sections.text: Pleadings.

sections.heading: Judgment
sections.text:
of ouster; relator to recover costs; delivery of books by defendant; violation

by corporation.

sections.heading: Judgment
sections.text: ousting director of corporation.

sections.heading: Action
sections.text: for damages within 1 year.

sections.heading: Judgment
sections.text: against corporation; dissolution or restraint.

sections.heading: Court
sections.text: shall appoint trustee for dissolved corporation; trustee�s compensation.

sections.heading: Bond
sections.text: of trustee.

sections.heading: Suit
sections.text: on trustee�s bond.

sections.heading: Trustee
sections.text: to collect debts and divide surplus.

sections.heading: Court
sections.text: shall order books and effects delivered to trustee.

sections.heading: Trustee
sections.text: to file sworn inventory with clerk.

sections.heading: Responsibilities
sections.text: of trustee.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.text: of corporation directors when judgment of ouster rendered.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for refusal to obey order of court.

sections.heading: Actions
sections.text: in quo warranto take precedence.

sections.heading: Procedure
sections.text:
in appellate court same as in district court; determination of issue of fact to

be tried by jury in district court.

sections.heading: Appeal
sections.text: does not stay judgment of ouster.

sections.text: Article 6
